name: 林水泉
objective: 先修課程：負責教授同意。物質熱力學特性、改變能量形式之基本原理、熱力學第一及第二定律、可逆性與可用性、動力循環、冷凍循環、混合氣、化學反應。
schedule:
週次	講授內容概要	課本章節
1.2	Introduction and basic conceptss	Chapter 1
3.4      Energy 	                           Chapter 2
5.6	Properties of pure substances	Chapter 3
7	Energy analysis of closed systems    Chapter 4	
8	Energy analysis of open systems      Chapter 5	
9	期中考	
10.11	The second law of thermodynamics     Chapter 6
12.13    Entropy                              Chapter 7
14.15    Exergy                               Chapter 8
16.17    Thermodynamic property relation      Chapter 12
18.	期末考
scorePolicy:
作業與平時出席佔30％，期中考佔30％，期末考佔40％
助教:謝毓聰
materials:
Fundamentals of Engineering Thermodynamics
  MORAN   SHAPIRO
